Title: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-NINE ENTITLED "AN ACT APPROPRIATING EIGHT MILLION ONE HUNDRED EIGHTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 508, October 27, 1939 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-NINE ENTITLED "AN ACT APPROPRIATING EIGHT MILLION ONE HUNDRED EIGHTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The following items of appropriation under section two, subsection A, paragraph (a), of Commonwealth Act Numbered Four hundred and sixty-nine are amended so as to read as follows:
x x x (Items omitted) x x x
Section 2. The following items under section 2, subsection A, paragraph (a) of Commonwealth Act Numbered Four hundred and sixty-nine are supressed:

Items )8, 39, 40, 41, and 42 under Cagayan ;
Item 44 under Laguna ;
Item 17 under Nueva Ecija ;
Items 105, 106, and 107 under Pangasinan;
Item 11 under Tarlac; and
Item 1 under Zambales.ℒαwρhi৷

Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, October 27, 1939.
